name: Medal Of Valor 3 - WW2
description:
Lead your squad through the theater of war in Medal Of Valor 3, equip yourself and 4 squad mates with multiple weapons of the era! Earn dog tags by tackling the levels at various difficulties and arm your squad to the teeth! Take the battle online with our newest edition to the series, multiplayer!

Forum: https://goo.gl/FEuhvM
